Service.Name: Attach media content to application
Service.description: Operaton for linking or attaching media content to the home application

Service.description: Operaton for fetching genres

Service.description: Operaton for fetching media types

Service.Name: Load audio metadata
Service.description: Operaton for loading audio metadata into the system in batch mode

Service.Name: Load video metadata
Service.description: Operaton for loading video metadata into the system in batch mode

Service.description: Operaton for fetching artist

Service.description: Operaton for updating artist

Service.description: Operaton for fetching artist's project

Service.description: Operaton for fetching tracks

Service.description: Operaton for updating tracks

Service.Name: Consolidated media search
Service.description: Operaton for fecthing media of all types

Service.Name: Manual media upload
Service.description: Operaton for manually uploading media into system and attaching to home application

Service.description: Operaton for fetching media content

Service.Name: Delete media content
Service.description: Operaton for deleting media content

Service.Name: Start media file listener
Service.description: Operaton for starting the medi file listener

Service.Name: Stop media file listener
Service.description: Operaton for stopping the medi file listener

Service.Name: Media file listener Health
Service.description: Operaton for checking the health of the medi file listener

Service.Name: Query timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for fetching timesheet.

Service.Name: Create or modify timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for updating timesheet profile information. To create an timesheet profile, the timesheet_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a timesheet profile, the timesheet_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Delete timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for deleting timesheets.

Service.Name: Submit timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for submitting timesheet.

Service.Name: Approve timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for approving timesheet.

Service.Name: Decline timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for declining timesheet.

Service.Name: Invoice timesheet
Service.description: Operaton for invoicing timesheets.

Service.Name: Print timesheet details
Service.description: Operaton for printing timesheet details.

Service.Name: Print timesheet summary
Service.description: Operaton for printing timesheet summary.

Service.Name: Create or modify employee profile
Service.description: Operaton for updating employee profile information. To create an employee profile, the employee_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a employee profile, the employee_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query employee profile
Service.description: Operaton for fetching employee profile information.

Service.Name: Query employee type profile
Service.description: Operaton for fetching employee type profile information.

Service.Name: Query employee title profile
Service.description: Operaton for fetching employee title profile information.

Service.Name: Query employee project
Service.description: Operaton for fetching employee project information.

Service.Name: Create or modify employee project profile
Service.description: Operaton for updating employee project profile information. To create an employee project profile, the employee_project_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a employee project profile, the employee_project_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query project client data
Service.description: Operaton for fetching project client information.

Service.Name: Query project profile
Service.description: Operaton for fetching project profile information.

Service.Name: Create or modify project profile
Service.description: Operaton for creating new or modfiying existing project profile information. To create an project profile, the project_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a project profile, the project_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Delete project profile
Service.description: Operaton for deleting project profile information.

Service.Name: Query task profile
Service.description: Operaton for fetching task profile information.

Service.Name: Create or modify task profile
Service.description: Operaton for creating a new or modifying an existing task profile.

Service.Name: Delete task profile
Service.description: Operaton for deleting task profile information. To create an task profile, the task_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a task profile, the task_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query zip code
Service.description: Operaton for fetching zip code information. The extent of the output can be controlled via teh result_format criteria element. If set to "FULL", then detailed output is created. If set to "SHORT", then summary output is created.

Service.Name: Query time zone
Service.description: Operaton for fetching time zone information.

Service.Name: Query state/province
Service.description: Operaton for fetching state/province information.

Service.Name: Query Country information
Service.description: Operaton for fetching country information.

Service.Name: Query IP Address information
Service.description: Operaton for fetching IP address information.

Service.Name: Create or modify contact lookup groups
Service.description: Operaton for creating new or modifying existing contact lookup groups. To create an lookup group, the group_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a lookup group, the group_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query contact lookup group
Service.description: Operaton for fetching contact lookup groups.

Service.Name: Delete contact lookup group
Service.description: Operaton for deleting contact lookup group.

Service.Name: Create or modify contact lookup codes
Service.description: Operaton for creating new or modifying existing contact lookup codes. To create an lookup code, the code_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a lookup code, the code_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query contact lookup code
Service.description: Operaton for fetching contact lookup codes.

Service.Name: Delete contact lookup code
Service.description: Operaton for deleting contact lookup code.

Service.Name: Query common, personal, or business contacts
Service.description: Operaton for fetching contacts based on the type of criteria used: business criteria, personal criteria, or common criteria.

Service.Name: Create or modify common, personal, or business contacts
Service.description: Operaton for creating new or modifying existing contact profiles based on the type of profile used: business profile, personal profile, or common profile.

Service.Name: Delete common, personal, or business contacts
Service.description: Operaton for deleting contact profiles based on the type of criteria used: business criteria, personal criteria, or common criteria.

Service.Name: Query GL Accounts
Service.description: Operaton for fetching one or more GL Accounts.

Service.Name: Query GL Account Types
Service.description: Operaton for fetching one or more GL Account types.

Service.Name: Query GL Account Category
Service.description: Operaton for fetching one or more GL Account categories.

Service.Name: Update GL Account Category
Service.description: Operaton for creating a new or modifying an exisint GL Account category.

Service.Name: Delete GL Account Category
Service.description: Operaton for deleting an exisint GL Account category.

Service.Name: Query inventory items
Service.description: Operaton for fetching one or more inventory items.

Service.Name: Create or modify inventory item
Service.description: Operaton for creating a new or modifying an existing inventory item. To create an inventory item, the item_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update an inventory item, the item_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Delete an inventory item
Service.description: Operaton for deleting an inventory item in the item_master table.

Service.Name: Activate inventory item
Service.description: Operaton for activating an inventory item in the item_master table.

Service.Name: Deactivate inventory item
Service.description: Operaton for deactivating an inventory item in the item_master table.

Service.Name: Add item retail override
Service.description: Operaton for adding retail override flag to an inventory item.

Service.Name: Remove item retail override
Service.description: Operaton for removing retail override flag from an inventory item.

Service.Name: Query inventory item statuses
Service.description: Operaton for fetching one or more inventory item statuses.

Service.Name: Query inventory item current status
Service.description: Operaton for fetching the current status of an inventory item.

Service.Name: Query inventory item status history
Service.description: Operaton for fetching the status history of an inventory item.

Service.Name: Query inventory item type
Service.description: Operaton for fetching inventory item tyope data.

Service.Name: Query Vendor Item
Service.description: Operaton for fetching a vendor's item.

Service.Name: Assign Vendor Item
Service.description: Operaton for associating a vendor's item to a RMT2 inventory item.

Service.Name: Remove Vendor Item
Service.description: Operaton for removing the association of a vendor's item to a RMT2 inventory item.

Service.Name: Update Vendor Item
Service.description: Operaton for modifying the association of a vendor's item to a RMT2 inventory item.

Service.Name: Query vendor assigned items
Service.description: Operaton for fetching vendor assigned items.

Service.Name: Query vendor unassigned items
Service.description: Operaton for fetching vendor unassigned items.

Service.Name: Query creditor profile
Service.description: Operation for fetching creditor data

Service.Name: Query creditor transactions history
Service.description: Operation for fetching creditor transaction history

Service.Name: Create or modify a creditor profile
Service.description: Operation for creating a new or updating an existing creditor profile. To create a cutomer profile, the creditor_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a creditor profile, the creditor_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Delete creditor profile
Service.description: Operation for deleting a creditor profile

Service.Name: Query creditor type data
Service.description: Operation for fetching creditor type data. Currently, there ar two types: Creditor and Vendor.

Service.Name: Query Customer profile
Service.description: Operation for fetching customer data

Service.Name: Query Customer transactions history
Service.description: Operation for fetching customer transaction history

Service.Name: Create or modify a Customer profile
Service.description: Operation for creating a new or updating an existing customer profile. To create a cutomer profile, the customer_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To update a customer profile, the customer_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Delete Customer profile
Service.description: Operation for deleting a customer profile

Service.Name: Query transaction lookup groups
Service.description: Operation for fetching information pertaining to transaction group lookup data.

Service.Name: Query transaction lookup codes
Service.description: Operation for fetching information pertaining to transaction code lookup data.

Service.Name: Query common transaction
Service.description: Operation for fetching common transaction information. The information fetched can be in full detail form or summary form. To fetch full details, set target_level criteria item to FULL. Otherwise, set to HEADER.

Service.Name: Create a common transaction
Service.description: Operation for creating a common transaction

Service.Name: Reverse a common transaction
Service.description: Operation for reverseing an existing common transaction

Service.Name: Query consolidated common transactions
Service.description: Operation for querying common transactions of differing types such as common, cash disbursements, cash receipts, creditor purchases, sales order invoices etc

Service.Name: Query cash disbursement transaction
Service.description: Operation for fetching cash disbursement transactions. The information fetched can be in full detail form or summary form. To fetch full details, set target_level criteria item to FULL. Otherwise, set to HEADER.

Service.Name: Create or reverse a cash disbursement transaction
Service.description: Operation for creating a new or reversing an existing cash disbursement transaction. To create a cash disbursement, the xact_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To reverse a cash disbursement, the xact_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query Cash Receipt
Service.description: Operation for fetching a cash receipt transaction

Service.Name: Create or Reverse a Cash Receipt
Service.description: Operatoin for creating a Cash Receipt transaction or reversing a cash receipt transaction. To create a cash receipt, the xact_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To reverse a cash receipt, the xact_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero.

Service.Name: Query creditor purchase transaction
Service.description: Operation for fetching a credit expense transaction.

Service.Name: Create a new or reverse an existing purchase transaction
Service.description: Operatoin for creating a new creditor expense purchase transaction. To create a creditor expense, the xact_id must not exist in the request or it must be set to zero. To reverse an existing creditor expense purchase transaction, the xact_id must be included in the request and its value must be greater than zero

Service.Name: Query sales order
Service.description: Operation queries sales order

Service.Name: Query extended sales order
Service.description: Operation queries sales order containing detailed data including service provider, customer, sales order, sales invoice, and sales order item data. Minimum input requirements are sales order id, customer id, and xact id.

Service.Name: Create sales order
Service.description: Operation creates a sales order

Service.Name: Create and invoice sales order
Service.description: Operation creates and invoices a sales order

Service.Name: Create, invoice, and apply payment to sales order
Service.description: Operation creates, invoices, and applies a payment to a sales order

Service.Name: Modify a sales order
Service.description: Operation applies updates to an existing sales order

Service.Name: Modify and invoice a sales order
Service.description: Operation applies updates to an existing sales order

Service.Name: Modify, invoice, and apply payment to a sales order
Service.description: Operation applies updates to an existing sales order

Service.Name: Delete a sales order
Service.description: Operation deletes an existing sales order from the system

Service.Name: Refund sales order
Service.description: Operation that refunds a sales order that has payments applied.

Service.Name: Cancel sales order
Service.description: Operation that cancels a sales order.

Service.Name: Close sales order and payment
Service.description: Closes a sales order along with applying a final payment.

Service.Name: Print sales order
Service.description: Produces a sales order in PDF format which is suiteable for printing.

Service.Name: Updates Application
Service.description: Apply changes to the Application configuration.

Service.Name: Fetch Application
Service.description: Retrieve application configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete Application
Service.description: Remove application configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update Role
Service.description: Update role configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch Role
Service.description: Retrieve role configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete Role
Service.description: Reomve role configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update Resource Type
Service.description: Update resource type configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch Resource Type
Service.description: Retrieve resource type configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete Resource Type
Service.description: Reomve resource type configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update Resource SubType
Service.description: Update resource subtype configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch Resource SubType
Service.description: Retrieve resource subtype configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete Resource SubType
Service.description: Reomve resource subtype configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update Resource
Service.description: Update resource configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch Resource
Service.description: Retrieve resource configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete Resource
Service.description: Reomve resource configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update User Group
Service.description: Update user group configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch User Group
Service.description: Retrieve user group configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete User Group
Service.description: Reomve user group configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update App Role
Service.description: Update application role configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch App Role
Service.description: Retrieve application role configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete App Role
Service.description: Reomve application role configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Update User
Service.description: Update user configuration data.

Service.Name: Fetch User
Service.description: Retrieve user configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete User
Service.description: Reomve user configuration data from the system.

Service.Name: Maintatin User Application Role
Service.description: Maintains user application role configuration data.

Service.Name: Delete User Application Role
Service.description: Deletes a single user application role.

Service.Name: Fetch User Permissions
Service.description: Retrieves user permissions configuration data.

Service.Name: Change Password
Service.description: Change the user's password.

Service.Name: User Login
Service.description: Authenticates a user.

Service.Name: User Logout
Service.description: Logs a user out of the system.

Service.Name: SSO User Login
Service.description: Uses Single Sign On (SSO) method to log user into system.
